travelData.name: Cox's Bazar
travelData.description: Cox's Bazar is a seaside town in southeastern Bangladesh. It's known for its long, sandy beachfront, which stretches from the mouth of the Sangu River to the Bangladesh-Myanmar border.

travelData.name: Srimangal
travelData.description: Srimangal is a tea garden area in northeastern Bangladesh. It's known for its tea estates, such as the Lawachara National Park and the Madhabpur Lake.

travelData.name: Sundarbans
travelData.description: The Sundarbans is a mangrove forest in southwestern Bangladesh. It's known for its Bengal tigers, saltwater crocodiles, and variety of bird species.

travelData.name: Dhaka
travelData.description: Dhaka is the capital city of Bangladesh, and is known for its vibrant street markets, historic landmarks, and bustling city life.

travelData.name: Kuakata
travelData.description: Kuakata is a seaside town in southern Bangladesh, and is known for its panoramic sea views and stunning sunsets.
